EmailTemplate.name: 18-0207 FL Launch
EmailTemplate.subject: Florida, we are here!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
BlueWave is pleased to announce that we are now accepting partner applications in Florida!
Who We Are BlueWave Solar (“BlueWave”) is a renewable energy company founded on a mission to provide Solar to Everyone, Everywhere. BlueWave partners with solar contractors like you to help achieve this mission!
Why Solar Contractors Choose our Residential Loan Platform:
Speedy disbursal schedules to improve dealer cash flow Individual incentives for sales reps based on loan volume Seamless online loan approval for customers, up to $100,000 No bridge loan needed due to our loan introductory monthly rates We are a B-Corp, meaning we are dedicated to the people and places we serve A history of developing over 100MW of Community Solar ourselves
Interested? Please contact our Florida Business Development Manager, John Michael Otis (803) 730-9289
We hope to partner with you to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere.
- All of us here at BlueWave
